ing: 1 (3 ounce) package instant ramen noodles (exclude seasoning packet)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "A quick recipe to help get rid of all the unnecessary chemicals of normal top ramen, while keeping the flavor."
ins: Bring 2 cups water to a boil in a saucepan. Cook noodles in boiling water until tender, about 3 minutes. Stir garlic powder, onion powder, and ginger into the noodles and water; season with salt and black pepper.
